name: Best Of South Coast Tour From Montego Bay
description: Y.S Falls & Black River Safari the road that gets you there is bumpy with a fee massage with a differences. This bumpy back road with looks very small to you, but we handled it very well. It will take you up in the mountain and a cross the country side, you see some form lands depends on what part of the Island we are coming from. We will do our first stop at the Black River safari 1:20 minutes then of to YS fall there you will take a tractor carriage ride over to the river. So hang on tight and takes your ride up to YS Falls. You can swim in the pools at the bottom of each cascade. The tour includes entrance fee to this attraction. Now for an extra cost there, you can do tubing down the river, or you can take the high speed canopy ride above the falls.You may pay a 50% deposit down with your card, and the rest of cash on the day of the tour, we do not take credit cards on the tour day. We will return to Montego Bay for shopping or lunch and then return to the ship or hotels.
